posts.title: webpack 打包配置NODE_ENV
posts.text: 这是webpack打包时的主要两个功能： 清除dist文件 配置 dist 打包方式 npm run dev npm run build:test npm run build:prod 1.pakage.json安装相关功能的插件：devDependencies => {clean-webpack-plugin,cross-env} 2.webpack.base.config.js1234567891011121314modules.exports = { output: { path: path.join(__dirname, '../dist'), publicPath: '/' }, plugins: [ new webpack.Provideplugin({}), new webpack.DefinePlugin({ 'process.env': { NODE_ENV: JSON.stringify(process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development') } }) ]} 3.webpack.prod.config.js12345678910111213const cleanWebpackPlugin = require('clean-webpack-plugin')const Path = require('path')modules.exports = { output: { path: path.join(__dirname, '../dist'), publicPath: '/dist/' }, plugins: [ new cleanWebpackPlugin(['dist'], { root: path.resolve(__dirname, '../dist') }) ]} 4.main.js123456const baseUrl = { development: '--------', // 测试地址 production: '--------' // 生产地址}baseUrl: baseUrl[process.env.NODE_ENV]
